activities: KLA-Tencor process EEA personal data relating to (1) employees and applicants of its subsidiaries for  purposes of global human resource management and administration, (2) contacts  of actual and prospective corporate customers, business  partners, independent  contractors and consultants in order to manage business  relationships, (3) product end users and prospects to provide services and  product information (4) individuals whose data KLA-Tencor processes on behalf  of business customers as a mere data processor, and (5) whistle-blower  hotline, internal investigations and remedial measures in support of global  code of conduct and compliance programs."
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: on-line, off-line, manually processed, hr data
recoursemech: EU Data Protection Authorities (DPAs) and Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner (FDPIC)
